response.overview: A carefully curated collection of Scottish comedian Brian "Limmy" Limond's six-second Vine videos, presented in chronological order. This compilation highlights Limmy's surreal comedic style, taking the audience on a dark and often repulsive journey through violence, masturbation, uncomfortable stares, and shouting at vans on the motorway.  Originally showcased at events such as the London Short Film Festival, this hour-long compilation demonstrates Limmy's inventive use of the Vine platform before its eventual discontinuation. As news publication DAZED put it; "Vine is our generation’s Dogme 95, and Limmy is the app’s Lars von Trier".
response.title: Limmy's Vines: Hour Long Supercompilation
